data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Barcelos.
In the minute 2, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira surge into the attack at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos but Joao Amaralâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
In the minute 6, Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelos.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Gil Vicente.
In the minute 10, Pacos Ferreira pushes forward through Pedrinho, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira move into a 0-1 lead through a Maracas header.
In the minute 10, That's a fine assist from Joao Amaral.
Adriano (Pacos Ferreira) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 15, Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
Rodrigao Prado scores with his head for Gil Vicente to level the match at 1-1.
In the minute 16, Ruben Ribeiro instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Gil Vicente.
Pacos Ferreira drive upfield and Douglas Tanque gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gil Vicente defender.
In the minute 18, Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Marco Baixinho (Pacos Ferreira) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 19, Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
Douglas Tanque (Pacos Ferreira) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 21, Bozhidar Kraev scores with a header and the home team now lead 2-1.
Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in high up the field for Gil Vicente in Barcelos.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 27, Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Goal! The away team draw level at 2-2 through Douglas Tanque.
In the minute 29, Great play from Bruno Santos to set up the goal.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
In the minute 31, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 33, Pacos Ferreira's Douglas Tanque gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gil Vicente defender.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 35, Free kick Gil Vicente.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Claude Goncalves has recovered and rejoins the match in Barcelos.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Pacos Ferreira drives forward and Stephen Eustaquio gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 40, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente's Rodrigao Prado has been booked in Barcelos and will miss the next match through suspension.
In the minute 42, Iancu Ioan Vasilica waits before resuming play because Pedrinho for Pacos Ferreira is still down.
Pedrinho returns to the field for Pacos Ferreira after picking up a slight injury.
Pacos Ferreira's Douglas Tanque goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Douglas Tanque (Pacos Ferreira) has received a yellow card from Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Pacos Ferreira drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente close to the penalty box.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
The second-half is underway in Barcelos.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Matchoi Djalo scores to make it 2-3 at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 49, Joao Amaral with an assist there.
Pacos Ferreira's Matchoi Djalo has been booked in Barcelos.
Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelos.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ruben Ribeiro of Gil Vicente smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 58, Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Gil Vicente.
Important block from the Pacos Ferreira defence as Bozhidar Kraev fires in a strike for Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
In the minute 64, In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
The home team have replaced Samuel Dias Lino with Lourency. This is the first substitution made today by Vitor Manuel Oliveira.
In the minute 65, Vitor Manuel Oliveira (Gil Vicente) is making a second substitution, with Joao Afonso replacing Soares.
Gil Vicente push forward at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos and Lourency gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Pacos Ferreira defence.
In the minute 66, Lourency hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Barcelos for Gil Vicente.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Helder Ferreira is replacing Pedrinho for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
The away team replace Matchoi Djalo with Mohamed Diaby.
Goal! Gil Vicente go level at 3-3 through Lourency in Barcelos.
Rodrigao Prado with an assist there.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelos.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 71, In Barcelos, Bozhidar Kraev of Gil Vicente is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 73, In Barcelos Pacos Ferreira drive forward through Stephen Eustaquio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Nogueira for Gil Vicente has been booked by Iancu Ioan Vasilica and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
Can Pacos Ferreira capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gil Vicente's half?
In the minute 75, Uilton is replacing Adriano for the away team.
In the minute 76, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 79, Gil Vicente are pushing forward but Lourency's finish is wide of the goal.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 81, Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
Vitor Manuel Oliveira is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos with Fernando Fonseca replacing Alex Pinto.
In the minute 82, In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Vitor Carvalho is replacing Bozhidar Kraev for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Gil Vicente.
Joao Afonso (Gil Vicente) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Edwin Banguera is on a sub for Ruben Fernandes for Gil Vicente.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente's Ruben Ribeiro breaks free at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 87, Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Gil Vicente.
In the minute 89, Pacos Ferreira make their fourth substitution with Luiz Carlos replacing Joao Amaral.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Gil Vicente.
In Barcelos Gil Vicente attack through Hugo Vieira. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelos.
Ruben Ribeiro for Gil Vicente gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
The match has come to a close in Barcelos. The final score is 3-3.
The away team replace Marco Ribeiro with Ze Oliveira.
